Here is how it would look like with the `.alert` class:
![screen shot 2017-01-10 at 22 38 08](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1745735/21825821/84ba61ec-d785-11e6-9ce8-b885da98503a.png)

```
.alert.alert-warning
    strong Warning: 
    | In your answers below, don't mention names (geographical features, universities, companies etc.) that can point to your location, please. This is to avoid bias in the selection process.
```
